description: Least positive integer k for which 7^n divides k!.
references: H. Ibstedt, Smarandache Primitive Numbers, Smarandache Notions Journal, Vol. 8, No. 1-2-3, 1997, 216-229.
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
prog: (PARI) a(n) = {k = 1; while (valuation(k!, 7) < n, k++); k;} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Aug 19 2013
author: _David W. Wilson_
